interfaces.name: Implementations

injectables.name: SynthFilterService

properties.name: setScreen
properties.description: Action to change screen name. This will be used in multi-screen aps to set filter visibility, and get correct query filters

methods.name: initializeFilters
methods.description: Initialize filters state. Get filters from localStorage and merge them with baseConfig and filterEntities.

jsdoctags.comment: which filters should be active on first load

classes.name: ValueAccessor

directives.name: BooleanValueAccessor
NumericValueAccessor
RadioValueAccessor

TextValueAccessor

components.name: ListComponent

inputsClass.name: activeKpi
inputsClass.description: Active kpi. it's going to be used to filter list data

inputsClass.name: data
inputsClass.description: Component data, this is going to be parsed internally

inputsClass.name: enableDownload
inputsClass.description: Flag to enable data download as xlsx

inputsClass.name: fieldsConfig
inputsClass.description: !REQUIRED Field configuration used in parse process

methodsClass.name: _parseList
methodsClass.description: If data exists and has length we will parse data

jsdoctags.comment: A list with a format acepted by glyph-list
